name: The Beast (HypercubeStudios)
description:
In this game you play as Matthew, a guy who recently lost his uncle due to a very strange accident. he arrives at his uncles house to collect his belongings when he finds something he wishes he never saw. 

Controls

  • A/D - Left / Right
  • W/S - Up / Down
  • E - Interact
  • Tab - Inventory
  • Esc - Menu
